abilities.desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a 650 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.notes: Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.

abilities.desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to [3.2, 3.8, 4.4, 5.0] seconds, with bonus damage up to 180 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.
abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.notes: Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.

abilities.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 4 seconds.
abilities.name: Leap

abilities.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible and grants bonus movement speed. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow\'s duration has not expired.
abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.notes: Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
